title: Wiesnbräu
summaries: The Wiesnbräu is a consumable buff potion that grants the Drunk buff when consumed. Under the effects of the buff, the damage the player takes and deals is halved (rounded up). This lasts for 30 seconds, but can be canceled at any time by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]). Consuming a Wiesnbräu also activates the Potion Sickness debuff, and it cannot be used while the debuff is active. It is purchased from the Merchant for 9 SC95 CC, during Oktoberfest.

statistics.Tooltip: Numbs the user from damage taken but also reduces damage inflicted
statistics.Buy: 9 SC95 CC
statistics.Sell: 1 SC99 CC
